ResultVisibility.Name: Result Visibility
ResultVisibility.Hint: Choose whether results and chat outputs are public or GM only.

ItemForgeEditMode.Name: Item Forge Edit Mode
ItemForgeEditMode.Hint: Change how interacting with the Item Forger works for users.

EnableKeywords.Name: Enable Keywords
EnableKeywords.Hint: Enable keywords when generating travel check results.

UseVariantTravelRules.Name: Use Variant Travel Rules
UseVariantTravelRules.Hint: Placeholder setting: Toggles alternative travel mechanics (currently unused).

UseVariantDamageRules.Name: Use Playtest Damage Rules
UseVariantDamageRules.Hint: When generating new weapons, damage will be based on new playtest rules.

DiscoveryEffectTable.Name: Discovery Effect Roll Table
DiscoveryEffectTable.Hint: Select the Roll Table to use for generating discovery effects.

DiscoverySourceTable.Name: Discovery Source Roll Table
DiscoverySourceTable.Hint: Select the Roll Table to use for generating discovery sources.

DangerThreatTable.Name: Danger Threat Roll Table
DangerThreatTable.Hint: Select the Roll Table to use for generating danger threats.

DangerSourceTable.Name: Danger Source Roll Table
DangerSourceTable.Hint: Select the Roll Table to use for generating danger sources.

CustomTreasureRollTable.Name: Custom Treasure Roll Table
CustomTreasureRollTable.Hint: Select the Roll Table to use for generating custom treasure.

MonsterCompendium.Name: Monster Compendium
MonsterCompendium.Hint: Select the Actor compendium to use as the source for Conflict Builder.

BattleSceneName.Name: Battle Scene
BattleSceneName.Hint: Select the Scene to use for the Conflict Builder preview.

anti-slow.Description: grants immunity to the slow status.

anti-daze.Description: grants immunity to the daze status.

anti-shaken.Description: grants immunity to the shaken status.

anti-weak.Description: grants immunity to the weak status.

anti-poison.Description: grants immunity to the poisoned status.

anti-enrage.Description: grants immunity to the enraged status.

resist-fire-earth.Description: grants resistance to fire and earth damage.

resist-fire-ice.Description: grants resistance to fire and ice damage.

resist-fire-air.Description: grants resistance to fire and air damage.

resist-fire-bolt.Description: grants resistance to fire and bolt damage.

resist-fire-dark.Description: grants resistance to fire and dark damage.

resist-fire-light.Description: grants resistance to fire and light damage.

resist-fire-poison.Description: grants resistance to fire and poison damage.

resist-earth-ice.Description: grants resistance to earth and ice damage.

resist-earth-air.Description: grants resistance to earth and air damage.

resist-earth-bolt.Description: grants resistance to earth and bolt damage.

resist-earth-dark.Description: grants resistance to earth and dark damage.

resist-earth-light.Description: grants resistance to earth and light damage.

resist-earth-poison.Description: grants resistance to earth and poison damage.

resist-ice-air.Description: grants resistance to ice and air damage.

resist-ice-bolt.Description: grants resistance to ice and bolt damage.

resist-ice-dark.Description: grants resistance to ice and dark damage.

resist-ice-light.Description: grants resistance to ice and light damage.

resist-ice-poison.Description: grants resistance to ice and poison damage.

resist-air-bolt.Description: grants resistance to air and bolt damage.

resist-air-dark.Description: grants resistance to air and dark damage.

resist-air-light.Description: grants resistance to air and light damage.

resist-air-poison.Description: grants resistance to air and poison damage.

resist-bolt-dark.Description: grants resistance to bolt and dark damage.

resist-bolt-light.Description: grants resistance to bolt and light damage.

resist-bolt-poison.Description: grants resistance to bolt and poison damage.

resist-dark-light.Description: grants resistance to dark and light damage.

resist-dark-poison.Description: grants resistance to dark and poison damage.

resist-light-poison.Description: grants resistance to light and poison damage.

perfect-health.Description: grants immunity to all status effects.

magical.Description: targets Magic Defense instead of Defense.

hunter-beasts-constructs.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and constructs.

hunter-beasts-demons.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and demons.

hunter-beasts-elementals.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and elementals.

hunter-beasts-humanoids.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and humanoids.

hunter-beasts-monsters.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and monsters.

hunter-beasts-plants.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and plants.

hunter-beasts-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts and undead.

hunter-constructs-demons.Description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs and demons.

hunter-constructs-elementals.Description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs and elementals.

hunter-constructs-humanoids.Description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs and humanoids.

hunter-constructs-monsters.Description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs and monsters.

hunter-constructs-plants.Description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs and plants.

hunter-constructs-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs and undead.

hunter-demons-elementals.Description: deals 5 extra damage to demons and elementals.

hunter-demons-humanoids.Description: deals 5 extra damage to demons and humanoids.

hunter-demons-monsters.Description: deals 5 extra damage to demons and monsters.

hunter-demons-plants.Description: deals 5 extra damage to demons and plants.

hunter-demons-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to demons and undead.

hunter-elementals-humanoids.Description: deals 5 extra damage to elementals and humanoids.

hunter-elementals-monsters.Description: deals 5 extra damage to elementals and monsters.

hunter-elementals-plants.Description: deals 5 extra damage to elementals and plants.

hunter-elementals-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to elementals and undead.

hunter-humanoids-monsters.Description: deals 5 extra damage to humanoids and monsters.

hunter-humanoids-plants.Description: deals 5 extra damage to humanoids and plants.

hunter-humanoids-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to humanoids and undead.

hunter-monsters-plants.Description: deals 5 extra damage to monsters and plants.

hunter-monsters-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to monsters and undead.

hunter-plants-undead.Description: deals 5 extra damage to plants and undead.

multi.Description: gives attacks with this weapon Multi(2).

accuracy-up.Description: gives a +1 bonus to accuracy checks.

magic-up.Description: gives a +1 bonus to magic checks.

vitality-up.Description: when you recover HP, you recover 5 extra HP.

healing-up.Description: spells you cast that restore HP, restore 5 extra HP.

spell-up.Description: spells you cast deal 5 extra damage.

melee-up.Description: melee weapon attacks deal 5 extra damage.

ranged-up.Description: ranged weapon attacks deal 5 extra damage.

aerial-1.Description: deals 5 extra damage during the first round of conflict.

aerial-2.Description: can be used in the off-hand for two-weapon fighting, regardless of category.

aerial-3.Description: allows you to perform the EQUIP action for free when you hit one or more creatures.

aerial-4.Description: grants immunity to damage dealt by flying creatures.

aerial-5.Description: halves the MP cost of spells targeting a creature suffering from slow.

aerial-6.Description: deals 5 extra damage to a creature when you damage a creature outside of your turn in a conflict.

thunderous-1.Description: gives one ally you can see the option to take their turn immediately after yours, when you deal bolt damage to a creature.

thunderous-2.Description: causes all enemies present in the scene to suffer dazed, when damage dealt by this weapon put an enemy into crisis.

thunderous-3.Description: grantshalf your level in the Elementalist Classas extra damage to your Cataclysm Skill.

thunderous-4.Description: causes the target of your Encourage Skill to recover extra HP equal tohalf your level.

thunderous-5.Description: deals 5 bolt damage to a creature that hits you with a melee attack.

thunderous-6.Description: causes each target of this weapon to lose 20 MP on a successful hit, if at least one of them is shaken.

paradox-1.Description: deals 5 extra damage as long as you have one other weapon equipped of a different category.

paradox-2.Description: grants you the effects of the Mirror spell at the beginning of a conflict scene.

paradox-3.Description: tethers up to 2 targets hit by this weapon. When either target loses HP from damage they are Vulnerable to, the other loses 5 HP.

paradox-4.Description: empowers a spell to deal 5 extra damage when it hits with critical success.

paradox-5.Description: causes an enemy in the scene to suffer a random status effect (1d4: dazed, shaken, slow, or weak), when that enemy heals from one or more status effects.

paradox-6.Description: causes enemies hit by this weapon to fade. If a fading enemy would recover HP, instead they recover no HP and stop fading.

terrestrial-1.Description: grants resistance to damage caused by environmental hazards.

terrestrial-2.Description: recovers 5 additional HP when you recover HP while in crisis.

terrestrial-3.Description: recovers MP equal to its HR when you hit a creature with this weapon.

terrestrial-4.Description: grants resistance to physical damage until the start of your next turn when you heal an ally in a conflict.

terrestrial-5.Description: gives a +2 bonus to Magic Checks for Elementalism Rituals with a total MP cost equal to or less than 60.

terrestrial-6.Description: causes any equipped heavy or spear weapon to deal 5 extra damage.

ardent-1.Description: halves the MP cost of your Bladestorm Skill when using this weapon.

ardent-2.Description: allows you to change the damage type of your Shadow Strike skill to fire instead of dark at will.

ardent-3.Description: deals 1 extra damage for every status effect you are suffering from.

ardent-4.Description: restores 5 MP when you invoke a bond during any check.

ardent-5.Description: prevents a creature from taking the Spell action during their next turn when successfully hit.

ardent-6.Description: causes any equipped bow or firearm weapon to deal 5 extra damage.

glacial-1.Description: deals 5 ice damage to every enemy present in the scene when you enter Crisis for the first time.

glacial-2.Description: makes Ice damage you deal ignore Immunities and Resistances.

glacial-3.Description: causes each creature in the scene suffering weak to lose 5 HP at the start of your turn in a conflict.

glacial-4.Description: gives a +1 bonus to DEF and M.DEF against attacks and offensive spells from enraged creatures.

glacial-5.Description: causes a creature to suffer slow, or lose 10 MP if already slowed when you deal ice damage to it.

glacial-6.Description: deals 5 extra damage to creatures suffering from the weak status effect.

spiritual-1.Description: heals you from a single status effect of your choice when you end your turn merged with an Arcanum.

spiritual-2.Description: deals 1 extra damage for each Bond of affection you have.

spiritual-3.Description: causes damage you deal to ignore resistance as long as you are affected by a spell with the scene duration.

spiritual-4.Description: applies all Accuracy Check bonuses to your Magic Check instead when using the Spellblade skill with this weapon.

spiritual-5.Description: heals an ally for 5 HP when you perform the Guard action and choose to cover that ally.

spiritual-6.Description: grants resistance to dark, light, and poison damage.

corrupted-1.Description: causes dark damage dealt by a spell using the Spellblade skill ignore Immunities and Resistances.

corrupted-2.Description: treats the M.DEF of targets of your offensive spells as being equal to their WLP die.

corrupted-3.Description: makes Dark and poison damage you deal ignore Immunities and Resistances.

corrupted-4.Description: halves the total MP cost of spells targeting a creature you have a Bond of hatred towards.

corrupted-5.Description: grants a +1 to DEF and M.DEF against attacks and offensive spells from shaken creatures.

corrupted-6.Description: inflicts the poisoned status on the target of your Counterattack skill.

aquatic-1.Description: allows you to treat your DEX as being one die higher until the end of your next turn when you reduce an enemy to 0 HP.

aquatic-2.Description: treats the DEF score of each target of this weapon as being equal to their current MIG die size.

aquatic-3.Description: recovers an amount of HP equal to the HR of a successful Magic Check when you cast an offensive spell.

aquatic-4.Description: prevents attacks with this weapon from triggering counterattacks or other reactive skills.

aquatic-5.Description: causes any ally that regains full HP to recover 5 MP as well.

aquatic-6.Description: allows you to reduce the damage of a creature hit with this weapon by the HR of its last recorded hit.

mechanical-1.Description: allows you to spend your opportunity to earn 100z.

mechanical-2.Description: gives a +2 to your accuracy check when you use the Breach skill with this weapon.

mechanical-3.Description: allows you to choose the area and effect of a potion you create using Gadget (Alchemy), if at least 2 dice show the same number.

mechanical-4.Description: deals 5 additional damage to creatures with traits related to metal.

mechanical-5.Description: earns you200 x SLworth of zenit when you use the Tavern Talk skill.

mechanical-6.Description: deals 5 extra bolt damage when you hit two or more creatures in a single turn with this weapon.

TravelResult.Title: Travel Result
TravelResult.Prompt: Do you want to keep this result or reroll?
TravelResult.NoIncident: The travel day passed without incident.

VillainPlanAdvance.Minor: The villains plan advances by 2 steps
VillainPlanAdvance.Heavy: The villains plan advances by 3 steps
VillainPlanAdvance.Massive: The villains plan advances by 4 steps

Sources.Source1: Altitude sickness, food poisoning, or general exhaustion slows the group.
Sources.Source2: Travel gear fails  wagons break, weapons snap, or crucial items go missing.
Sources.Source3: Local or global political unrest causes interruptions or confrontations.
Sources.Source4: A harsh natural event  storms, quakes, floods  brings delay and peril.
Sources.Source5: You attract the attention of a rival, villain, or monster.
Sources.Source6: Supernatural interference alters the path: portals, hauntings, omens.
Sources.Source7: A mysterious NPC appears, altering or obstructing your path.
Sources.Source8: An ancient or hidden mechanism is triggered unexpectedly.
Sources.Source9: You trespass on sacred ground or violate a taboo unknowingly.
Sources.Source10: The wilderness reveals a secret  but it comes at a price.
Sources.Source11: Wildlife becomes territorial or aggressive, creating complications.
Sources.Source12: A landmark has changed, misguiding your path.
Sources.Source13: Resources deplete faster than expected, straining survival.
Sources.Source14: Dreams or visions disrupt progress with cryptic warnings.
Sources.Source15: A divine or arcane presence tests your worth or purity.
Sources.Source16: A curse or magical interference subtly warps your environment.
Sources.Source17: An ally reveals a secret that throws everything into question.

Effects.Effect3: You discover a rare herb with healing properties.
Effects.Effect4: You find a relic of cultural or historical importance.
Effects.Effect5: You gain insight into a local custom or legend.
Effects.Effect6: You learn a shortcut that will aid future travel.
Effects.Effect7: A friendly creature aids your party temporarily.
Effects.Effect8: You find ancient writing that hints at future events.
Effects.Effect9: A clue to a larger mystery is uncovered.
Effects.Effect10: The landscape inspires a sudden burst of creativity.
Effects.Effect11: You forge a useful tool or item from salvaged parts.

Sources.Source1: A beautiful scenery that remains almost untouched for centuries.
Sources.Source2: Ruins of a village that tells the story of an old war.
Sources.Source3: An altar with inscriptions from a forgotten civilization.
Sources.Source4: A cave where an old campfire and supplies are found.
Sources.Source5: A buried time capsule from another age.
Sources.Source7: A monolith covered in glowing runes.
Sources.Source8: Bones of a massive creature never before seen.
Sources.Source9: A place where the stars seem to align perfectly.
Sources.Source10: An unusual weather phenomenon revealing hidden terrain.
Sources.Source11: A melody carried on the wind, with no clear origin.
Sources.Source12: A single tree growing out of stone, radiating magic.
